XenotypeDef.label: Two California
XenotypeDef.description: California burned twice—first in the blast, then in the cold. The survivors of both sides—American and Baja—bear the scars of nuclear hellfire and the ice that followed. The Two Californias forged a bitter unity, rebuilding from the bones of cities and the ghosts of surf and sand. They remember paradise, and they remember its end.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Survivors from both Californias—north and south, divided by fire yet bound by endurance.
